item.title: Migrating from Pandas to Polars: A Performance Revolution for UN Data Processing
item.description:
In the world of data processing, performance improvements can make the difference between a system that works and one that truly excels. Recently, I led a migration from Pandas to Polars for processing United Nations datasets, and the results were nothing short of remarkable. This post shares our journey, the challenges we faced, and the substantial performance gains we achieved.
